project.description: Patch FPGA image on Colossus DX 1x100G NIC

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_CHASSIS_IP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address of Spirent TestCenter chassis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_FPGA_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Directory on remote chassis where FPGA image files are located, example: /mnt/spirent/hypervisor/fpga

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_INSTALL_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Spirent TestCenter BLL/UI installation target directory

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "Copy FPGA image to remote STC chassis" #sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass scp -v -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ./ColossusDX_1x100G.bit root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP}:${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G_jenkins.bit sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass scp -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ./ColossusDX_1x100G.bit root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP}:${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G_jenkins.bit
echo "Configure FPGA image soft-link to remote STC chassis" #sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -t -v -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "cd ${STC_FPGA_DIR}; ln -sf ColossusDX_1x100G_jenkins.bit ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G.bit" sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "cd ${STC_FPGA_DIR}; ln -sf ColossusDX_1x100G_jenkins.bit ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/ColossusDX_1x100G.bit"
#sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -t -v -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "cd ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/; ls -al ColossusDX_1x100G.bit" #sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "cd ${STC_FPGA_DIR}/; ls -al ColossusDX_1x100G.bit"

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import os import sys
os.environ['STC_PRIVATE_INSTALL_DIR'] = os.getcwd() + '/' + os.environ['STC_INSTALL_DIR']
os.chdir(os.environ['STC_INSTALL_DIR'])
print 'cwd=%s' % os.getcwd()
print os.environ
#print 'STC_PRIVATE_INSTALL_DIR=%s' % os.environ['STC_PRIVATE_INSTALL_DIR']
sys.path.insert(0, os.getcwd())
print sys.path
from StcPython import StcPython
stc = StcPython()
print 'Spirent TestCenter version: %s' % stc.get('system1', 'version')
#stc.connect(os.environ['STC_CHASSIS_IP']) #hPhysicalChassis = stc.get('physicalchassismanager1', 'children-physicalchassis') #stc.perform('RebootEquipment', EquipmentList=hPhysicalChassis)
exit()

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "New FPGA version: " sshpass -f /etc/stc_chassis.pass ssh -o root@${STC_CHASSIS_IP} "BAR0=`cat /proc/bus/pci/devices | awk '{ if ($2 == \"174a0a05\") {print $4} }'`; /mnt/spirent/hypervisor/fpga/peek32 $BAR0 | grep 0x$BAR0 | awk '{ print $3}'"
